They sell for more when they're identified, the pick might be surprisingly good or we may need it's capacity for brutal piercing damage when fighting a heavily armoured monster, the cost isn't high and there's no reason Ayla would rip us off, whilst they were pretty scrubby one was at least level three since he was dual wielding.

'Sides, the scimitar is apparently 'masterwork' which doesn't sound base tier at any rate
